summary: The module implements a linear evaluation pipeline for node embeddings generated by a graph representation learning model. It prepares labels, splits data, trains logistic regression classifiers (including one‑vs‑rest and hyper‑parameter search), computes predictions, and reports performance metrics such as F1 scores.
business_intent: Enable downstream assessment of learned graph embeddings by providing a ready‑to‑use evaluation routine that quantifies how well the embeddings support node classification tasks.
